property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card without attachments and with lower Gold Cost: Bow the targeted card. If your Personality is a Magistrate, you may target an enemy card and reduce its Gold Cost to 0.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Target a dishonorable Personality and pay Gold equal to his base Personal Honor plus one: He may not be assigned, and will not move, to battlefields this turn. Open: Target a dishonorable Personality: Give him two -2 Gold Cost tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Kensai: Straighten him and all his Weapons. Battle abilities on his Weapons may be used a second time this turn. You may take an additional Battle action.

Battle: Choose your performing opposed Personality and discard this card: The Lords of Death grant him strength. Give him +1F for each dead Personality in all players' discard piles. Negate the next card effect that bows, destroys, or moves him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SHADOWLANDS AIR NINJA SHUGENJA UNIQUE ONYX CHAMPION After Takasho enters play: Lose 3 Honor. Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move Takasho there. You may take an additional Battle action which Takasho must perform. Maho Battle: Ranged 5 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Political Reaction: After the resolution of a battle at a province, if you destroyed any enemy units or a province in that resolution: The battle's loser loses 4 Honor. Battle: Choose your performing Magistrate: Straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH Reaction: After another player's action targets your defending Personality, if this Shugenja is Earth, destroy this card: Negate the Personality's destruction from the action's effects. Battle/Open: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja and target your Nonhuman: Straighten it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA ALCHEMIST UNIQUE Reaction: After the resolution of your action that bowed a Personality, target a Personality at the same location: Bow him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN EARTH SHUGENJA ALCHEMIST MOUNTAINEER Yayu has +2F and Cavalry while it is not your turn. Battle: Bow or destroy one of Yayu's Spells: He lobs an alchemical potion at the enemy. Ranged 5 Attack.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TEMPLE Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Limited: Bow your performing Shugenja: Gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: EARTH After you gain Honor from destroying an army in battle resolution, if this Shugenja is Earth and in the winning army: Gain 2 Honor. Battle: If you are the Defender, target a Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: KIHO Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target a Personality whose Force is different from his own base Force: Bow or straighten him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Until your second turn from now begins, all provinces have a maximum strength equal to their base strength, and after each time another player who controls no units at the current battlefield announces a Battle action, he discards a card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Negate all current and new Force penalties on him.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: IAIJUTSU As a Focus Effect: Negate any destruction for losing this duel. After this duel ends, its winner's controller gains 2 Honor. Reaction: After another player's Iaijutsu action targets your Personality: Negate his destruction from the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN EARTH MONK EMPTY HAND TATTOOED Reaction: After the resolution of an action that bowed a Personality at Hizumi's battlefield, target him: Negate his next straightening (this turn). Battle: Give the current battlefield's province +4 or -4 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: DRAGON CLAN FIRE MONK TATTOOED Reaction: After Meiyu enters play: Give her three +1F Fire tokens.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN NONHUMAN BEAR SPIRIT May not be included in decks. Battle: Target an attacking enemy card: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: TEMPLE Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold. Open: Bow this card and target a Ring in play or in your discard pile: If the Ring is in play, straighten it. Otherwise, put it into your hand and destroy this card.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI NAVAL SCOUT Reaction: After you announce an action, if Yakusho is at the current battlefield: Ranged Attacks from the action's effects will not have their strength reduced.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target an enemy card with as many or fewer Followers: Bow it. Negate its next straightening (this turn).

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN SAMURAI BATTLE MAIDEN CAVALRY PARAGON EXPERIENCED UNIQUE After the resolution of an action that gave a Force penalty to an enemy card at Liu-Xeung's battlefield: Give Liu-Xeung +1F. Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNICORN CLAN IMPERIAL SAMURAI BATTLE MAIDEN CAVALRY PARAGON Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: You may move Mai to the current battlefield. If she is now there, give the targeted card a Force penalty equal to Mai's Personal Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Open: Destroy your performing Ancestor Personality and target a Personality: Bow him. Negate his straightening until your next Events Phase begins. Limited: If you control an Ancestor Personality: Gain 2 Honor. Each player who does not control an Ancestor Personality loses 2 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FIRE KIHO TATTOO Battle: Bow your performing Tattooed Monk and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Destroy a card without attachments in his unit. Straighten your Personality if he is Fire and this destroyed an attachment.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: UNIQUE Until your second turn from now begins, after the resolution of the first action each phase that one or more Personalities performed, bow them.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: WATER WEAPON May not be included in decks. Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: AIR Limited: Bow this Shugenja and target another player's Personality: If he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor. If this Shugenja is Air, gain 1 Honor.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: FEAR Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Spirit and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. This movement will not be negated.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN DAIMYO COURTIER KOLAT MERCHANT EXPERIENCED 2 LOYAL UNIQUE MASTER COIN Political Open: Target a Holding or Stronghold: Straighten it. Political Reaction: After an action targets your Merchant, pay 2 Gold: Negate the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: CRAB CLAN COURTIER CRIME BOSS MERCHANT Reaction: After Tsujiken enters play, target a Holding: Until Tsujiken leaves play, after each time its controller bows it, he loses 1 Honor. Open: Bow Tsujiken and target a Holding: Straighten it. You may bow it if its base Gold Cost is 4 or lower.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: SCORPION CLAN AIR COURTIER SHUGENJA WARD MASTER LOYAL Political Open: Target another player's Personality: If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 1 Honor. Otherwise, give your provinces +2 strength.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI COMMANDER NAVAL CAPTAIN OF THE THIRD KAMA Battle: Bow your performing Follower and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN SAMURAI HALF-NAGA MAGISTRATE NAVAL Minori has +1F for each other Magistrate in her army.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: MANTIS CLAN COURTIER BULLY MERCHANT Reaction: When paying a Gold Cost, bow Sakuma: Produce 2 Gold. Political Reaction: After another player's Political action targets one of your Personalities, bow Sakuma: The player may pay 2 Gold. If he did not, negate the action's effects.

property.name: Text Box
property.value: Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality in one of your provinces: Bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs but paying 6 less Gold. After the battle ends, if he is in play, discard all his attachments and put him into one of your provinces, face-up, discarding any card there.
